Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: பிழைத்துணர்ந்தும் பேதைமை சொல்லா ரிழைத்துணர்ந்தீண்டிய கேள்வி யவர்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Not e'en through inadvertence speak they foolish word, With clear discerning mind who've learning's ample lessons heard.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A wise scholar, who has accumulated vast knowledge through hearing ('ஈண்டிய கேள்வியவர்'), is shown in deep thought. A shadowy, confusing illusion representing a misconception ('பிழைத்துணர்ந்து') appears before them.
Layered_Composition.Midground: Instead of speaking rashly based on the illusion, the scholar's profound learning (visualized as a deep, clear well of water within their chest) filters the illusion, and they remain silent, refusing to speak a foolish word ('பேதைமை சொல்லார்').
Layered_Composition.Background: A library or hall of wisdom, reinforcing their deep and extensive learning.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Those who have profoundly learned through listening will not speak foolishly, even when they have misunderstood something, because their deep knowledge provides discernment.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The shadowy illusion is the misconception. The clear well of water inside the scholar represents their deep, discerning knowledge gained through hearing, which prevents foolish speech.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The scholar and their inner well of knowledge are illuminated by a clear, steady light. The illusion is a flickering, dark shadow. The palette is intellectual and calm.

Technical_Cues.Camera: Medium close-up, with a semi-transparent view of the scholar's chest to show the inner well of knowledge.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with complex visual effects for the illusion and the inner well.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Contrasting light—clear and steady for the scholar, dark and flickering for the illusion.

Negative_Prompt: scholar speaking foolishly, clear illusion, muddy well of knowledge, text artifacts, cartoonish.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the shadowy illusion.
